Text: Request was for DivX PRO 7.0 - not the free DivX 7.0. but thanks anyway... :-(

How To Register:
DivX Player > Extras > DivX For Mac Registration...

Registration is stored in:
~/Libary/Preferences/system.iUtils.prefs

@rodella

Thank you for your support. I was writing more or less the same comment, but also adding a deep excuse for not explaining how to open the file, how to look in it, how to open a serial-text, how to open the .dmg, and how to look in the menubar of the DivX-player, but I decided not to do so. Maybe the expression in my language "you don't look into the mouth of a given horse" would have been enough!

Thanks for the download because it works fine in 10.5 Leopard, but this mofo sure doesn't work with 10.6 Snow Leopard.  Even the official DivX player doesn't work for me.  The DivX player just freezes on launch, so don't bother with it for 10.6.
